altername_name: Naruto: Ninja Destiny II: European Version
Naruto Shippuu Den: Shinobi Retsuden II
name: Naruto Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2
overview: Naruto Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2 features fast paced Naruto Shippuden 3D fighting action with the addition of an all-new Quest Mode, new characters, jutsu and a storyline based on the Naruto Shippuden animated series. The title also features wireless multiplayer gameplay, offering Naruto fans and newcomers to the series competitive 3D fighting on the Nintendo DS.
